name: ASCredentialIdentityStore
desc: A container that your extension fills to provide credentials through the QuickType bar.

items.name: func getState((ASCredentialIdentityStoreState) -> Void)
items.desc: Gets the state of the credential identity store.

items.name: class ASCredentialIdentityStoreState
items.desc: A representation of the state of a credential identity store.

items.name: func saveCredentialIdentities([ASPasswordCredentialIdentity], completion: ((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Saves the given credential identities to the store.

items.name: func replaceCredentialIdentities(with: [ASPasswordCredentialIdentity], completion: ((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Replaces existing credential identities with new credential identities.

items.name: func removeAllCredentialIdentities(((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Removes all existing credential identities from the store.

items.name: func removeCredentialIdentities([ASPasswordCredentialIdentity], completion: ((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Removes the given credential identities from the store.

items.name: class ASPasswordCredentialIdentity
items.desc: A description that uniquely identifies a particular credential.
